body_html: Is config.gpu_options.per_process_gpu_memory_quota_mb=xxx going to be supported? I think this will help to describe the basic memory usage of a model and makes the same model to conveniently execute among different kinds of GPU.
body_text: Is config.gpu_options.per_process_gpu_memory_quota_mb=xxx going to be supported? I think this will help to describe the basic memory usage of a model and makes the same model to conveniently execute among different kinds of GPU.
body: Is `config.gpu_options.per_process_gpu_memory_quota_mb=xxx` going to be supported? I think this will help to describe the basic memory usage of a model and makes the same model to conveniently execute among different kinds of GPU.
